title: People
subtitle: A virtual wallet that converts your pesos to dollars.
description: Maybe you have heard of virtual wallets, maybe you have already used one to send and receive money, but there is something that you have not seen and that until now you thought was impossible: having the first virtual wallet on your cell phone that instantly converts your pesos into dollars.That's right, and once in dollars, your money will be ready to enjoy it anywhere in the world.
